[`View`](../View) › [`scope`](./scope)

## View.scope property

Assign an optional scope to your view to register hotkeys for when the view is in focus.

**Signature:**

```typescript
scope: Scope | null;
```

## Example

```ts
this.scope = new Scope(this.app.scope);
```

null
